QuestData.Title: Frenzied Furbolgs
QuestData.Description: I would help you seek audience with the Archdruid, but we have a difficult situation on our hands.$B$BThe nearby furbolgs have gone into a frenzied rage.$B$BFor days, it has been all we can do to protect our grove from their aggression.$B$BThey have cut off our access to the barrow dens, where the Archdruid and our clan sleep in the Emerald Dream.$B$BIn order to awaken them, we must first get past the furbolg.
QuestData.RewardText: The conflict against the furbolgs is abated, for now.
